item.title: India Shelter Finance Corporation Forms Death Cross, Signalling Potential Bearish Trend
item.description: India Shelter Finance Corporation, a key player in the housing finance sector, has recently formed a Death Cross, a technical pattern where the 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average. This development often signals a shift towards a bearish trend and suggests a potential weakening in the stock’s medium to long-term momentum. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Dev Information Technology Stock Falls to 52-Week Low Amidst Continued Downtrend
item.description: Dev Information Technology has reached a new 52-week low, with its stock price touching an intraday low of ₹35.44, just 1.43% above its lowest level of ₹35.26 over the past year. This marks a significant point in the stock’s performance as it continues to trade below all major moving averages, reflecting ongoing pressures within the Computers - Software & Consulting sector. Time: 4 hours ago
